text: Daniel "Dani" Shmulevich-Rom () שמולביץ; 29 November 1940 - 18 January 2021) was an Israeli footballer. He played for the Maccabi Haifa F.C. from 1957 to 1973. He also played for the national team. Shmulevich-Rom died on 18 January 2021 from cancer at the age of 80.אגדת מכבי חיפה, דני רום, הלך לעולמו בגיל 80 (in Hebrew) ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Israel Category:Israeli footballers
title: Dani Shmulevich-Rom
